title: Add official online-sourced logos for all products and serve them as local static assets

requirements.text: Add official original logo/image assets (sourced online) for every product shown in `frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx`, store them as static files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, and update the product `image` fields to reference only these local static asset paths (no remote/external image URLs at runtime).

quotes: Please upload all the products original images/logo from online.

acceptanceCriteria: For each product in `frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx` (Netflix Premium, Chess.com Diamond Membership, Spotify, YouTube Premium, ChatGPT, Gemini, Facebook, Toffee, Chorki, Deepto Pay, Bioscope, iScreen, Hoichoi, PUBG Mobile, Free Fire, Adobe Creative, Canva, Truecaller, CamScanner), there is a corresponding official logo/image file present under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
All product `image` values in `frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx` reference local paths beginning with `/assets/generated/` and do not use any remote URLs.
The app builds successfully and product cards render logos without broken image icons; if an image fails to load, the existing letter-placeholder fallback still appears (no UI regression).

constraints: Do not modify any frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not introduce remote/external image URLs at runtime; logos/images must be served locally from `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
Preserve existing storefront behavior (search filtering, cart, WhatsApp flows, priced vs unpriced behavior) while updating only product imagery references.
nonGoals: Changing product pricing, durations, ratings, or WhatsApp message formats.
Adding backend logic or persistence for products or images.
Redesigning the storefront UI theme beyond what is required to display the updated images.
